mapper.insert: insert into db_spbase (SPCODE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, PHONE1, 'STATE', CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, 'TYPE', AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO, 'NAME', RESERVE, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SERVICETYPE, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS ) values (#{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{corpprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wqycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{agentcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ivrcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{faxcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{saving,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{assignflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{sellarea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{contact1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{servicetype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{manufacturearea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update db_spbase set SPNUMBER = #{spnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PHONE1 = #{phone1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'STATE' = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CORPPROP = #{corpprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WQYCODE = #{wqycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPSTATUS = #{spstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 'TYPE' = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENTCOUNT = #{agentcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DAYNUM = #{daynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IVRCOUNT = #{ivrcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAXCOUNT = #{faxcount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE = #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SAVING = #{saving,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ASSIGNFLAG = #{assignflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LINKMAN = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGO = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE = #{reserve,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SELLAREA = #{sellarea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, CONTACT1 = #{contact1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, SERVICETYPE = #{servicetype,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, MANUFACTUREAREA = #{manufacturearea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SPCODE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, PHONE1, 'STATE', CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, 'TYPE', AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO, 'NAME', RESERVE, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SERVICETYPE, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS from db_spbase where SPCODE = #{spcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SPCODE, SPNUMBER, OPER, OPERTIME, PHONE1, 'STATE', CORPPROP, WQYCODE, SPSTATUS, 'TYPE', AGENTCOUNT, DAYNUM, IVRCOUNT, FAXCOUNT, FEE, SAVING, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ASSIGNFLAG, LINKMAN, TEL, EMAIL, LOGO, 'NAME', RESERVE, SELLAREA, CONTACT1, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, SERVICETYPE, MANUFACTUREAREA, ADDRESS from db_spbase
